keyboard_set_numlock.htm+html.head.title: keyboard_set_numlock.htm+html.body.p:87-3
keyboard_set_numlock: You can use this function to switch the keypad number-lock on or off (set to true for on, and false for off).

keyboard_set_numlock.htm+html.head.title: keyboard_set_numlock.htm+html.body.p:88-3
keyboard_set_numlock: NOTE: This functionality is only available in the Windows target builds and will not function on any other device.

keyboard_set_numlock.htm+html.head.title: keyboard_set_numlock.htm+html.body.table.tbody.tr.td:100-9
keyboard_set_numlock: Set this to true for "on" and false for "off"

keyboard_set_numlock.htm+html.head.title: keyboard_set_numlock.htm+html.body.p:117-3
keyboard_set_numlock: The above example code will get the state of the numberlock key and if it is on (true) it will set it to off (false) and vice-versa.
